Protocols/FWVideoAdDelegate.html#/c:objc.name: -playerShouldInsertItem:afterItem:
Protocols/FWVideoAdDelegate.html#/c:objc.abstract: The app should insert the provided AVPlayerItem object after another item in the item queue of an AVQueuePlayer instance.

Protocols/FWVideoAdDelegate.html#/c:objc.name: -playerShouldPlayItem:
Protocols/FWVideoAdDelegate.html#/c:objc.abstract: The app should start playing the provided AVPlayerItem object.

Protocols/FWVideoAdDelegate.html#/c:objc.name: -playerShouldPauseItem:
Protocols/FWVideoAdDelegate.html#/c:objc.abstract: The app should pause the provided AVPlayerItem object if it’s the currently playing item in the AVQueuePlayer instance.

Protocols/FWVideoAdDelegate.html#/c:objc.name: -playerShouldRemoveItem:
Protocols/FWVideoAdDelegate.html#/c:objc.abstract: The app should remove the provided AVPlayerItem object from the item queue in the AVQueuePlayer instance that the app maintains. Note that the app should pause the player if the item is the current playing item in the AVQueuePlayer instance.

Protocols/FWExtension.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.name: -initWithFWContext:
Protocols/FWExtension.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.abstract: Initialize the extension with a id instance.

Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.name: -moduleInfo
Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.abstract: Get module info. The returned dictionary should contain key FWInfoKeyModuleType with FWModuleType* value,

Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.name: -initWithRendererController:
Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.abstract: Initialize the renderer with a renderer controller.

Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.name: -adView
Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.abstract: Return the primary view on which the ad is rendered

Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.name: -pause
Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.abstract: User intended pause. Should pause ad playback and send IAB _pause callback by calling [rendererController processEvent:FWAdPauseEvent info:nil]

Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.name: -resume
Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.abstract: User intended resume. Should resume ad playback and send IAB _resume callback by calling [rendererController processEvent:FWAdResumeEvent info:nil]

Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.name: -getFriendlyObstructionConfigurations
Protocols/FWRenderer.html#/c:objc(pl)FWR.abstract: Return all potential friendly obstruction configurations added by the renderer in the playback lifecycle.

Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.name: -version
Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.abstract: Return the Major version of AdManager, e.g. 0x02060000 for v2.6

Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.name: -notificationContext
Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.abstract: Returns the sender of all FreeWheel related notifications.

Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.name: -scheduleAdInstancesInSlots:
Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.abstract: Schedule ad instances for the given slots.

Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.name: -requestTimelinePause
Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.abstract: Request timeline to pause. The timeline consists of the content video and all linear slots.

Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.name: -requestTimelineResume
Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.abstract: Request timeline to resume. The timeline consists of the content video and all linear slots.

Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.name: -log:
Protocols/FWRendererController.html#/c:o.abstract: Renderer should use this API to trace all logs

Protocols/FWCreativeRendition.html#/c:ob.name: -otherCreativeRenditionAssets
Protocols/FWCreativeRendition.html#/c:ob.abstract: Get all non-primary assets of the rendition

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -adId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the ad ID of the ad instance. This value can also be found in the advertising module of the FreeWheel MRM UI.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -adUniqueId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get a uniquely identifiable ID of the ad instance. For ads from third party or external sources, via SSVT, this ID includes externalAdId to reflect the true uniquely identifiable ID.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -replicaId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the replica ID of the ad instance.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -dealId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get deal id of the ad instance if the ad is delivered via deal, otherwise it will be an empty String. This property is readonly.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -openExchangeId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the open exchange id of the ad instance if the ad is delivered via the Open Exchange rule, otherwise it will be an empty String. This property is readonly.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -marketUnifiedAdId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the market unified ad id of the ad instance if the ad is delivered via deal or the Open Exchange rule, otherwise it will be an empty String. This property is readonly.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -action
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the action of the ad instance.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -externalAdId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the external ad ID of the ad instance for ads from third party or external sources, via SSVT. Please note, this will return an empty string for first party ads or if the external ad ID is not available via the third party owner

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -soAdUnit
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the sold as ad unit value of an ad instance.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -creativeId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the creative ID of the ad instance

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -primaryCreativeRendition
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the primary rendition of the ad instance

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -rendererController
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the renderer controller of the ad instance

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -companionSlots
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the companion slots of the ad instance

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -companionAdInstances
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the playable companion ad instances

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -vastExtensionsWithType:
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the vast extensions matching the input type

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -isRequiredToShow
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Whether the ad is required to be shown by law, usually the ad is a companion ad

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -creativeRenditions
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get all creative renditions of the ad instance

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -slot
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the slot that contains this ad instance

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -duration
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get duration of the ad instance

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -playheadTime
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the ad instance’s playhead

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -skipOffset
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the ad instance’s skipOffset value

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -getEventCallbackUrlsByEventName:eventType:
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the callback urls for the specified event

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -setEventCallbackUrls:forEventName:eventType:
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Set callback urls for the specified event

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -addCreativeRendition
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Add a creative rendition to the ad instance

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -getParameter:
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Retrieve the parameter from the ad instance.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -universalAdId
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Get the universal ad ID of the ad instance, if it is returned in the SMRX ad response. If there is no universal ad ID in the SMRX ad response, and the ad is a VAST ad, this method will return the universal ad ID from the VAST ad, if applicable. Note that this only applies to VAST ads after they have started playback.

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -setPrimaryCreativeRendition:
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Set the primary creative rendition

Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.name: -getAdSkippableState
Protocols/FWAdInstance.html#/c:objc(pl)F.abstract: Indicates whether the ad playhead time has reached the skipoffset time for VAST Linear Skippable Ads. For VPAID ads, indicates that the ad is able to be skipped.

Protocols/FWVastExtension.html#/c:objc(p.name: -type
Protocols/FWVastExtension.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Get the type of the extension. Returns a nil string if key is absent in the VAST response

Protocols/FWVastExtension.html#/c:objc(p.name: -value
Protocols/FWVastExtension.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Get the value of the extension. Returns the insides of the Extension

Protocols/FWVastExtension.html#/c:objc(p.name: -owner
Protocols/FWVastExtension.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Get the owner of the extension who generated or handled it last in the request chain. Returns a nil string if not available.

Protocols/FWIABUniversalAdId.html#/c:obj.name: -idRegistry
Protocols/FWIABUniversalAdId.html#/c:obj.abstract: Get the registry of the universal ad ID, which is a string used to identify the URL for the registry website where the unique

Protocols/FWIABUniversalAdId.html#/c:obj.name: -idValue
Protocols/FWIABUniversalAdId.html#/c:obj.abstract: Get the value of the universal ad ID, which is a string for the unique creative ID.

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -adInstances
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Get the ad instances in the slot

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -width
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Get the width of the slot in pixels as returned in ad response.

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -height
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Get the height of the slot in pixels as returned in ad response.

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -visible
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Get slot’s visibility. Only applicable to non-temporal slots. YES by default.

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -signalId
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Get the signal Id of the slot. Applicable in Linear TV Integrations

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -skipCurrentAd
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Skips the current ad in the slot.

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -setVisible:
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Set the visibility for a nontemporal slot.

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -setParameter:withValue:
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Set a parameter on the slot level

Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.name: -getParameter:
Protocols/FWSlot.html#/c:objc(pl)FWSlot(.abstract: Get the value of a parameter by its name

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: videoAdDelegate
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: The delegate to handle video ads.

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -temporalSlots
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Get all temporal slots

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -videoPlayerNonTemporalSlots
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Get all video player non-temporal slots

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -siteSectionNonTemporalSlots
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Get all site section non-temporal slots

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -videoLocation
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Get video asset’s location URL

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -adManager
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Get the AdManager instance for this context

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -notificationCenter
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Return the object [NSNotificationCenter defaultCenter]

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -setVideoDisplayBase:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Set video display base UIView. REQUIRED. Video ads are rendered within the base view in the same frame.

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -setVideoState:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Notify the SDK about the current state of the content video

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -setVideoPlayheadTime:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Set the current playhead time of the content video

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -getSlotsByTimePositionClass:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Get all slots of a specified time position class.

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -getSlotByCustomId:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Get a slot by its custom ID

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -submitRequestWithConfiguration:timeout:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Submit an ad request to FreeWheel Ad Server

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -addRendererClass:forContentType:creativeAPI:slotType:baseUnit:adUnit:withParameters:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Add renderer class to context which takes higher priority than renderers configured in the profile.

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -setParameter:withValue:forLevel:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Set a parameter on a specified level.

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -getParameter:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Retrieve the value of a parameter

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -notifyUserAction:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Notify the SDK about user actions

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -loadExtension:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Load player extension by its class name

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -requestTimelinePause
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Request timeline to pause. The timeline consists of the content video and all linear slots.

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -requestTimelineResume
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Request timeline to resume. The timeline consists of the content video and all linear slots.

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -setAdVolume:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Set volume for current and subsequent ad playback

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -adVolume
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Get volume for ad playback

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -addFriendlyObstructionConfiguration:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Add the friendly obstruction configuration of a view which should be excluded from all ad session viewability calculations for Open Measurement SDK. This method will have no effect if called after the ad session has finished.

Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.name: -removeFriendlyObstructionConfiguration:
Protocols/FWContext.html#/c:objc(pl)FWCo.abstract: Remove a registered friendly obstruction view for Open Measurement SDK. This method will have no effect if called after the ad session has finished.

Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.name: -getOMSDKLibraryVersion
Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.abstract: Get the version of the integrated OMSDK.

Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.name: -getOMSDKPartnerVersion
Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.abstract: Get the AdManager version string that is submitted to OMSDK.

Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.name: -setNetworkId:
Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.abstract: Set the network ID. Required. Consult your FreeWheel solution engineer for the value to set.

Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.name: -setLocation:
Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.abstract: Set the current location of the device. This value will only be used for geo targeting purposes.

Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.name: -disableFWCrashReporter
Protocols/FWAdManager.html#/c:objc(pl)FW.abstract: Disable FreeWheel crash reporter. By default AdManager will send a crash report to ad server when an app crash is detected.

Protocols/FWIABUniversalAdId.html.name: FWIABUniversalAdId
Protocols/FWIABUniversalAdId.html.abstract: An abstraction of the IAB definition of Universal Ad ID. For more details on the IAB Universal Ad ID, please refer to section 3.7.1 in the VAST 4.0 spec: https://www.iab.com/guidelines/digital-video-ad-serving-template-vast-4-0/.

Protocols/FWVastExtension.html.name: FWVastExtension
Protocols/FWVastExtension.html.abstract: An abstraction of the IAB definition of Extension. Extensions enable custom integrations which cannot be covered in the scope of VAST spec. For more details on the VAST Extensions, please refer to https://www.iab.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/VAST-2_0-FINAL.pdf

Enums/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.htm.name: FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionMediaControls
Enums/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.htm.abstract: Friendly obstruction type in OMSDK Extension: media controls.

Enums/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.htm.name: FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionCloseAd
Enums/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.htm.abstract: Friendly obstruction type in OMSDK Extension: close ad.

Enums/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.htm.name: FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionNotVisible
Enums/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.htm.abstract: Friendly obstruction type in OMSDK Extension: not visible.

Enums/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.htm.name: FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionOther
Enums/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.htm.abstract: Friendly obstruction type in OMSDK Extension: other.

Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.name: FWUserActionPauseButtonClicked
Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.abstract: User action: video player’s pause button is clicked

Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.name: FWUserActionResumeButtonClicked
Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.abstract: User action: video player’s resume button is clicked

Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.name: FWUserActionClick
Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.abstract: User action: the video ad is clicked by the user. Used only in Stream Stitcher integrations.

Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.name: FWUserActionSeek
Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.abstract: User action: the video ad is seeked by the user. Used only in Stream Stitcher integrations.

Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.name: FWUserActionActivatePipPlay
Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.abstract: User action: Picture in Picture mode is activated

Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.name: FWUserActionDeactivatePipPlay
Enums/FWUserAction.html#/c:@E@FWUserActi.abstract: User action: Picture in Picture mode is deactivated

Enums/FWVideoAssetDurationType.html#/c:@.name: FWVideoAssetDurationTypeExact
Enums/FWVideoAssetDurationType.html#/c:@.abstract: Video asset duration type: Exact. This value should be used for video asset whose exact duration is known.

Enums/FWVideoAssetDurationType.html#/c:@.name: FWVideoAssetDurationTypeVariable
Enums/FWVideoAssetDurationType.html#/c:@.abstract: Video asset duration type: Variable. This value should be used for live stream video asset whose exact duration is not available.

Enums/FWRendererStateType.html#/c:@E@FWR.name: FWRendererStatePreloaded
Enums/FWRendererStateType.html#/c:@E@FWR.abstract: Renderer State: Preloaded. Renderer should transit to this state as soon as it finishes preloading.

Enums/FWRendererStateType.html#/c:@E@FWR.name: FWRendererStateStarted
Enums/FWRendererStateType.html#/c:@E@FWR.abstract: Renderer State: Started. Renderer should transit to this state as soon as it starts.

Enums/FWRendererStateType.html#/c:@E@FWR.name: FWRendererStateCompleted
Enums/FWRendererStateType.html#/c:@E@FWR.abstract: Renderer State: Completed. Renderer should transit to this state when it has completed all its workflow and ready to be destroyed.

Enums/FWRendererStateType.html#/c:@E@FWR.name: FWRendererStateFailed
Enums/FWRendererStateType.html#/c:@E@FWR.abstract: Renderer State: Failed. Renderer should transit to this state when the workflow is interrupted due to some errors.

Enums/FWSlotType.html#/c:@E@FWSlotType@F.name: FWSlotTypeSiteSectionNonTemporal
Enums/FWSlotType.html#/c:@E@FWSlotType@F.abstract: Type of slot: non-temporal slot in site section

Enums/FWCapabilityStatus.html#/c:@E@FWCa.name: FWCapabilityStatusDefault
Enums/FWCapabilityStatus.html#/c:@E@FWCa.abstract: Default capability status. The default value can be either on or off for each individual capability.

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.name: FWSlotInitialAdOptionStandAlone
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.abstract: Display an ad in the non-temporal slot

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.name: FWSlotInitialAdOptionKeepOriginal
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.abstract: Keep the original ad in the non-temporal slot

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.name: FWSlotInitialAdOptionFirstCompanionOnly
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.abstract: Use the non-temporal ad in the first companion ad package

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.name: FWSlotInitialAdOptionFirstCompanionThenStandAlone
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.abstract: Fill this slot with the first companion ad, or display a new stand alone ad if there is no companion ad

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.name: FWSlotInitialAdOptionFirstCompanionOrNoStandAlone
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.abstract: Fill this slot with the first companion ad, but never deliver a standalone ad if there is no companion ad

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.name: FWSlotInitialAdOptionNoStandAlone
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.abstract: Fill this slot only with the PREROLL slot’s companion ad if there is one

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.name: FWSlotInitialAdOptionNoStandAloneIfTemporal
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.abstract: Fill this slot with a standalone ad only when no temporal ad will be delivered, if there is any temporal ad selected, let this slot stay unfilled

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.name: FWSlotInitialAdOptionFirstCompanionOrNoStandAloneIfTemporal
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html#/c:@E@F.abstract: Fill this slot with a stand alone ad only when no temporal ad will be delivered, if there is any temporal ad selected, let this slot stay unfilled; however if there is companion, can use this companion to initialize this slot

Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html.name: FWSlotInitialAdOption
Enums/FWSlotInitialAdOption.html.abstract: Enumeration of non-temporal slot ad initial options

Enums/FWVideoAssetAutoPlayType.html.name: FWVideoAssetAutoPlayType
Enums/FWVideoAssetAutoPlayType.html.abstract: Enumeration of video asset auto play types

Enums.html#/c:@E@FWConsentApplicable.name: FWConsentApplicable
Enums.html#/c:@E@FWConsentApplicable.abstract: Enumeration for defining the applicability of user consent.

Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestInitiatedNot.name: FWRequestInitiatedNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestInitiatedNot.abstract: Notification broadcast when ad request has been initiated.

Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestCompleteNoti.name: FWRequestCompleteNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestCompleteNoti.abstract: Notification broadcast when ad request has completed.

Constants.html#/c:@FWSlotPreloadedNotifi.name: FWSlotPreloadedNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWSlotPreloadedNotifi.abstract: Notification broadcast when a slot has finished preloading.

Constants.html#/c:@FWSlotStartedNotifica.name: FWSlotStartedNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWSlotStartedNotifica.abstract: Notification broadcast when a slot has started.

Constants.html#/c:@FWSlotEndedNotificati.name: FWSlotEndedNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWSlotEndedNotificati.abstract: Notification broadcast when a slot has ended.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInAppViewWillOpenMe.name: FWInAppViewWillOpenMediaDocumentNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWInAppViewWillOpenMe.abstract: Notification broadcast when inAppView will open a media document from URI.

Constants.html#/c:@FWContentPauseRequest.name: FWContentPauseRequestNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWContentPauseRequest.abstract: Notification broadcast when AdManager needs your content video player to pause.

Constants.html#/c:@FWContentResumeReques.name: FWContentResumeRequestNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWContentResumeReques.abstract: Notification broadcast when AdManager needs your content video player to resume.

Constants.html#/c:@FWUserActionNotificat.name: FWUserActionNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWUserActionNotificat.abstract: Notification broadcast when a user action occurs.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdEventNotification.name: FWAdEventNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdEventNotification.abstract: Notification broadcast when an ad event occurs. An ad event will trigger a corresponding event callback request to FreeWheel ad server. For example, when an ad starts, a FWAdEventNotification with event name FWAdImpressionEvent will be broadcast, the corresponding impression beacon will fire at the same time.

Constants.html#/c:@FWVideoDisplayBaseDid.name: FWVideoDisplayBaseDidChangeNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWVideoDisplayBaseDid.abstract: Notification broadcast when the video display base is changed.

Constants.html#/c:@FWVideoDisplayBaseFra.name: FWVideoDisplayBaseFrameDidChangeNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWVideoDisplayBaseFra.abstract: Notification broadcast when the video display’s frame has been changed.

Constants.html#/c:@FWExtensionLoadedNoti.name: FWExtensionLoadedNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWExtensionLoadedNoti.abstract: Notification broadcast when an extension is loaded.

Constants.html#/c:@FWExternalPlaybackInt.name: FWExternalPlaybackInterruptedNotification
Constants.html#/c:@FWExternalPlaybackInt.abstract: Notification broadcast when the user presses Apple Remote’s Menu button while an ad is AirPlaying.

Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilitySlotTempl.name: FWCapabilitySlotTemplate
Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilitySlotTempl.abstract: Capability: Player expects template-based slots generated by ad server.

Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityCheckComp.name: FWCapabilityCheckCompanion
Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityCheckComp.abstract: Capability: Player expects ad server to check companion for candidate ads.

Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityCheckTarg.name: FWCapabilityCheckTargeting
Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityCheckTarg.abstract: Capability: Player expects ad server to check targeting for candidate ads.

Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilitySyncMulti.name: FWCapabilitySyncMultipleRequests
Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilitySyncMulti.abstract: Capability: Player expects ad server synchronize the request state between multiple requests.

Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityResetExcl.name: FWCapabilityResetExclusivity
Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityResetExcl.abstract: Capability: Reset the exclusivity scope. Player can turn on/off this capability before making any request.

Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityFallbackA.name: FWCapabilityFallbackAds
Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityFallbackA.abstract: Capability: Player expects the ad server to return fallback alternatives for every ad delivered if possible.

Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityMultipleC.name: FWCapabilityMultipleCreativeRenditions
Constants.html#/c:@FWCapabilityMultipleC.abstract: Capability: Player expects multiple creative renditions for an ad.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdLoadedEvent.name: FWAdLoadedEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdLoadedEvent.abstract: Ad event: ad loaded. Ad has loaded.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdPreInitEvent.name: FWAdPreInitEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdPreInitEvent.abstract: FWAdPreInitEvent is dispatched when an AdInstance has started either playback attempt or preloading in background, whichever comes first.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdSkippableStateCha.name: FWAdSkippableStateChangedEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdSkippableStateCha.abstract: FWAdSkippableStateChangedEvent is dispatched when an AdInstance is skippable. This is determined when the AdInstance’s current playhead time passes the skipoffset time. This will not fire if no skipoffset is provided.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdImpressionEndEven.name: FWAdImpressionEndEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdImpressionEndEven.abstract: Ad event: ad end impression. Ad ends.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdFirstQuartileEven.name: FWAdFirstQuartileEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdFirstQuartileEven.abstract: Ad event: first quartile. Ad progress reaches 25%.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdMidpointEvent.name: FWAdMidpointEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdMidpointEvent.abstract: Ad event: mid point. Ad progress reaches 50%.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdThirdQuartileEven.name: FWAdThirdQuartileEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdThirdQuartileEven.abstract: Ad event: third quartile. Ad progress reaches 75%.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdVolumeChangedEven.name: FWAdVolumeChangedEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdVolumeChangedEven.abstract: Ad event: volume changed. Ad volume is changed.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdAcceptInvitationE.name: FWAdAcceptInvitationEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdAcceptInvitationE.abstract: Ad event: accept invitation. User accepts invitation.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdSkippedByUserEven.name: FWAdSkippedByUserEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdSkippedByUserEven.abstract: Ad event: skipped. Ad has been skipped by the user.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdResellerNoAdEvent.name: FWAdResellerNoAdEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdResellerNoAdEvent.abstract: Ad event: reseller no ad. AdManager fails to get any playable ad from a 3rd party reseller.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdErrorEvent.name: FWAdErrorEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdErrorEvent.abstract: Ad event: an error has occurred. When an error occurs, a FWAdEventNotification will be broadcast with the following userInfo payload:

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdMeasurementEvent.name: FWAdMeasurementEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdMeasurementEvent.abstract: Ad event: concrete event (for CPx integrations only)

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdBufferingStartEve.name: FWAdBufferingStartEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdBufferingStartEve.abstract: Ad event: Ad buffering has started. Player can use this event to start displaying a buffering animation.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdBufferingEndEvent.name: FWAdBufferingEndEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdBufferingEndEvent.abstract: Ad event: Ad buffering has ended. Player can use this event to remove the buffering animation.

Constants.html#/c:@FWAdProgressEvent.name: FWAdProgressEvent
Constants.html#/c:@FWAdProgressEvent.abstract: Ad event: Ad reached a progress point. Player can use this event to listen for when a progress tracking event fired. Player can access the progress offset value in seconds using FWInfoKeyAdOffset. VPAID ads do not support this event type.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVideoAdRen.name: FWParameterVideoAdRendererTimeout
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVideoAdRen.abstract: Parameter: NSString representing the timeout value of playing a video ad in seconds.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterOpenClickT.name: FWParameterOpenClickThroughInApp
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterOpenClickT.abstract: Parameter: Open click through url in inAppView or external app. See inAppView for more information.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterInAppViewL.name: FWParameterInAppViewLoadingTimeout
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterInAppViewL.abstract: Parameter: NSString representing the timeout value of loading a url in inAppView in seconds.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterEnableCoun.name: FWParameterEnableCountdownTimer
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterEnableCoun.abstract: Parameter: enable countdown timer for applicable ads.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterCountdownT.name: FWParameterCountdownTimerRefreshInterval
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterCountdownT.abstract: Parameter: countdown timer refresh interval, in milliseconds.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterCountdownT.name: FWParameterCountdownTimerUpdateCallback
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterCountdownT.abstract: Parameter: javascript function to call when the countdown timer is updated, NSString.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterCountdownT.name: FWParameterCountdownTimerTextSize
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterCountdownT.abstract: Parameter: countdown timer font size in css syntax.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterCountdownT.name: FWParameterCountdownTimerTextFont
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterCountdownT.abstract: Parameter: countdown timer font family in css syntax.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterExtensionS.name: FWParameterExtensionSkippableAdButtonPosition
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterExtensionS.abstract: Parameter: skip button position inside video display base.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterNonTempora.name: FWParameterNonTemporalSlotVisibilityAutoTracking
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterNonTempora.abstract: Parameter: Enable / disable automatic visibility tracking of nontemporal slots. When enabled, non-temporal slots will be played automatically once they are visible on the device screen.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVideoAdRen.name: FWParameterVideoAdRendererShowBufferIndicator
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVideoAdRen.abstract: Parameter: indicates whether AdManager should show buffering animation when a video ad is buffering.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterDetectClic.name: FWParameterDetectClick
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterDetectClic.abstract: Parameter: indicates whether AdManager should handle user tappings on a video ad.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterDesiredBit.name: FWParameterDesiredBitrate
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterDesiredBit.abstract: Parameter: desired bitrate. Current viewer’s available bandwidth.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterImageRende.name: FWParameterImageRendererPrimaryAnchor
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterImageRende.abstract: Parameter: Anchor point of image in overlay slots.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterImageRende.name: FWParameterImageRendererMarginWidth
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterImageRende.abstract: Parameter: X axis offset relative to the anchor point of image in overlay slots.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterImageRende.name: FWParameterImageRendererMarginHeight
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterImageRende.abstract: Parameter: Y axis offset relative to the anchor point of image in overlay slots.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterImageRende.name: FWParameterImageRendererTimeout
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterImageRende.abstract: Parameter: Timeout in seconds for downloading an image to display

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterHTMLRender.name: FWParameterHTMLRendererPrimaryAnchor
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterHTMLRender.abstract: Parameter: Anchor point of html in overlay slots.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterHTMLRender.name: FWParameterHTMLRendererMarginWidth
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterHTMLRender.abstract: Parameter: X axis offset relative to the anchor point of html in overlay slots.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterHTMLRender.name: FWParameterHTMLRendererMarginHeight
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterHTMLRender.abstract: Parameter: Y axis offset relative to the anchor point of html in overlay slots.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterHTMLRender.name: FWParameterHTMLRendererIsBackgroundTransparent
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterHTMLRender.abstract: Parameter: indicate if html renderer is a transparent background

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVPAIDRende.name: FWParameterVPAIDRendererCreativeTimeoutDelay
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVPAIDRende.abstract: Parameter: Timeout for loading VPAID creative in milliseconds

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterSIMIDRende.name: FWParameterSIMIDRendererCreativeTimeoutDelay
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterSIMIDRende.abstract: Parameter: NSString representing the timeout value in milliseconds that AdManager will wait for the SIMID creative to respond before reporting an error to the SIMID creative with the RESPONSE_TIMEOUT SIMID Player error code.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterEnableBody.name: FWParameterEnableBodyElementInVPAIDIframe
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterEnableBody.abstract: Parameter: Enable the body element in VPAID creative loading iframe

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterIABConsent.name: FWParameterIABConsentSubjectToGDPRKey
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterIABConsent.abstract: Parameter: Used to set whether the ad is subject to GDPR regulations in the application. This key should be set in [NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults].

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterIABConsent.name: FWParameterIABConsentConsentStringKey
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterIABConsent.abstract: Parameter: Used to set what information and which vendors the user consented to in the application. This key should be set in [NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults].

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterIABUSPriva.name: FWParameterIABUSPrivacyStringKey
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterIABUSPriva.abstract: Parameter: Used to set the disclosures made and choices selected by a user regarding consumer data privacy in association with CCPA. This key should be set in [NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults].

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterGPPCMPAPIS.name: FWParameterGPPCMPAPIStringKey
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterGPPCMPAPIS.abstract: Parameter: Used to set GPP CMD API String. This key should be set in [NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults].

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterGPPCMPAPIS.name: FWParameterGPPCMPAPISectionIdStringKey
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterGPPCMPAPIS.abstract: Parameter: Used to set GPP CMD API Section ID(s). This key should be set in [NSUserDefaults standardUserDefaults].

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVastMaxWra.name: FWParameterVastMaxWrapperCount
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVastMaxWra.abstract: Parameter: NSString representing the maximum amount of VAST wrappers allowed. The ad will fail with an error when the number of wrappers equals this number.

Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVastTimeou.name: FWParameterVastTimeoutInMilliseconds
Constants.html#/c:@FWParameterVastTimeou.abstract: Parameter: NSString representing the amount of time in milliseconds allowed for a VAST creative before it fails due to timeout.

Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyPostalCod.name: FWRequestKeyPostalCode
Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyPostalCod.abstract: Ad request key: Postal code of the current viewer.

Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyAreaCode.name: FWRequestKeyAreaCode
Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyAreaCode.abstract: Ad request key: Area code of the current user.

Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyDateOfBir.name: FWRequestKeyDateOfBirth
Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyDateOfBir.abstract: Ad request key: User’s date of birth.

Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyMarital.name: FWRequestKeyMarital
Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyMarital.abstract: Ad request key: Marital status of the current user.

Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyEthnicity.name: FWRequestKeyEthnicity
Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyEthnicity.abstract: Ad request key: Ethnicity of the current user.

Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyOrientati.name: FWRequestKeyOrientation
Constants.html#/c:@FWRequestKeyOrientati.abstract: Ad request key: Orientation of the current user.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyError.name: FWInfoKeyError
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyError.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: error. Error message of a failed ad request or failed extension load.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeySlotCustomId.name: FWInfoKeySlotCustomId
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeySlotCustomId.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: slot custom ID. Custom ID of the related slot

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeySlot.name: FWInfoKeySlot
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeySlot.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: slot. The FWSlot instance of the relevant slot.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdInstance.name: FWInfoKeyAdInstance
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdInstance.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: adInstance. The FWAdInstance instance of the relevant ad instance.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdId.name: FWInfoKeyAdId
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdId.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: ad ID. ID of the relevant ad.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyReplicaId.name: FWInfoKeyReplicaId
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyReplicaId.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: replica ID. Replica ID of the relevant ad.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyCreativeId.name: FWInfoKeyCreativeId
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyCreativeId.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: creative ID. ID of the relevant creative.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyUserAction.name: FWInfoKeyUserAction
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyUserAction.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: user action type. Type of the relevant user action.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyModuleName.name: FWInfoKeyModuleName
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyModuleName.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: module name. Name of relevant module that triggered the notification.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyModuleType.name: FWInfoKeyModuleType
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyModuleType.abstract: Renderer moduleInfo dictionary key: module type, renderer or translator.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyRequiredSDKV.name: FWInfoKeyRequiredSDKVersion
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyRequiredSDKV.abstract: Renderer moduleInfo dictionary key: required SDK version. Expects a NSNumber.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyErrorCode.name: FWInfoKeyErrorCode
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyErrorCode.abstract: Use this key in the details dictionary to provide the error code when the renderer/translator transits to FWRendererStateFailed.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyErrorInfo.name: FWInfoKeyErrorInfo
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyErrorInfo.abstract: Use this key in the details dictionary to provide detailed error info when the renderer/translator transits to FWRendererStateFailed. Expects NSString.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyStartTimePos.name: FWInfoKeyStartTimePosition
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyStartTimePos.abstract: Use this key in the details dictionary to provide detailed error info when the renderer/translator transits to FWRendererStateStarted. Expects NSInteger.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyErrorModule.name: FWInfoKeyErrorModule
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyErrorModule.abstract: Use this key in the details dictionary to provide the error'ed module’s name when the renderer/translator transits to FWRendererStateFailed. Expects NSString.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdEventName.name: FWInfoKeyAdEventName
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdEventName.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: ad event name. Name of the ad event.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyCustomEventN.name: FWInfoKeyCustomEventName
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyCustomEventN.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: custom event name. Name of the custom event in NSString.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyShowBrowser.name: FWInfoKeyShowBrowser
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyShowBrowser.abstract: Ad event details dictionary key: show browser. Should the click event result in the opening of a url. Expects @"YES" or @"NO".

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdOffset.name: FWInfoKeyAdOffset
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdOffset.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: offset. Gets the progress event’s offset value in seconds.

Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdSkippableS.name: FWInfoKeyAdSkippableState
Constants.html#/c:@FWInfoKeyAdSkippableS.abstract: Notification userInfo dictionary key: skippableState. Gets the NSNumber value associated with whether the skippable state has changed.

Constants.html#/c:@FWErrorNullAsset.name: FWErrorNullAsset
Constants.html#/c:@FWErrorNullAsset.abstract: Error code: creative rendition asset is null.

Constants.html#/c:@FWErrorNoAdAvailable.name: FWErrorNoAdAvailable
Constants.html#/c:@FWErrorNoAdAvailable.abstract: Error code: no ad is available from 3rd party ad source.

Constants.html#/c:@FWErrorPreloadNotImpl.name: FWErrorPreloadNotImplementedByTranslator
Constants.html#/c:@FWErrorPreloadNotImpl.abstract: Error code: preload is not implemented by the translator.

Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: ipV4Address
Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: IP address of the visitor in IPv4 format

Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: bandwidth
Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Bandwidth of the visitor in Kbps (Kilo bits per second)

Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: -setValue:forHTTPHeaderField:
Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Adds a given key-value pair for appending headers in the Ad Request.

Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: -httpHeaders
Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Copy of HTTP headers hash map of the visitor

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: duration
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Duration of the whole video asset in seconds

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: requestDuration
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: The duration of the content segment that this ad request is sent for in seconds.

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: durationType
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Type of the video asset’s duration, see FWVideoAssetDurationType

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: autoPlayType
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Whether the video starts playing automatically without user interaction. See FWVideoAssetAutoPlayType

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: videoPlayerRandom
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Random number generated every time a user watches the video asset

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: videoLocation
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Location(URI) of the video asset, nil by default

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: fallbackId
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Video ID to fallback to. When ad server fails to find the video asset specified by videoAssetId, this ID will be used. nil by default

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: currentTimePosition
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: The current time position of the content asset in seconds.

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: networkId
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: ID of the network the video belongs to, 0 by default

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: windowStartTime
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: The timestamp of the start time of the break window. Must be an integer greater than zero. A breakSequence for a temporal slot configuration must also be set for this value to be added to the Ad Request. This property is only inteded for Comcast T6 integrations.

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: -initWithVideoAssetId:idType:duration:durationType:autoPlayType:
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Initialize a video asset configuration for the ad request.

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: -setVideoAssetId:idType:
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Set the ID of the video asset.

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.name: -setVideoAssetDuration:durationType:
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html#/.abstract: Set the duration of the video asset.

Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.name: timePosition
Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: Time position of the slot with respect to content playback timeline

Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.name: cuePointSequence
Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: Cue Point Sequence indicates the sequence number of a midroll break

Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.name: maximumDuration
Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: Maximum duration allowed for the slot. 0 indicates no limit

Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.name: minimumDuration
Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: Minumum duration allowed for the slot. 0 indicates no limit

Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.name: maxAds
Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: Maximum number of ads allowed for the slot. 0 indicates no limit

Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.name: signalId
Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: Signal ID, only applicable in Linear TV Streams, of the break

Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.name: breakSequence
Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: The break sequence. Must be an integer greater than zero. This value will not be added to the Ad Request unless the video asset configuration’s windowStartTime is also set. This property is only inteded for Comcast T6 integrations.

Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html#/c:objc.name: adUnit
Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html#/c:objc.abstract: Ad unit of the ads allowed to be delivered into this slot

Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html#/c:objc.name: slotProfile
Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html#/c:objc.abstract: Slot profile used for ad selection. Slot profile, if set, will override player profile during ad selection.

Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html#/c:objc.name: acceptPrimaryContentTypes
Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html#/c:objc.abstract: Primary content types allowed for ads delivered into the slot.

Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html#/c:objc.name: acceptContentTypes
Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html#/c:objc.abstract: Content types allowed for ads delivered into the slot

Classes/FWSiteSectionConfiguration.html#.name: fallbackId
Classes/FWSiteSectionConfiguration.html#.abstract: Site section ID to fall back to. When ad server fails to find the site section specified by siteSectionId, this ID will be used (0 by default)

Classes/FWSiteSectionConfiguration.html#.name: pageViewRandom
Classes/FWSiteSectionConfiguration.html#.abstract: Random number generated everytime a user visits the current site section

Classes/FWSiteSectionConfiguration.html#.name: siteNetworkId
Classes/FWSiteSectionConfiguration.html#.abstract: ID of the network the site section belongs to (0 by default)

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: serverURL
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: The server URL where the ad request will be sent

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: requestMode
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: The mode of the ad request: FWRequestModeOnDemand(by default) or FWRequestModeLive

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: subsessionToken
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: The subsession token value used for synchronizing multiple ad requests.

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: videoDisplayCompatibleDimensions
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: A list of acceptable alternative dimensions for video ads. Each dimension in the array must be a NSDictionary object with key “width” and “height”, the value of should be a positive integer. nil by default. Example:

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: playerDimensions
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Player Dimensions used for building Ad Request Configuration Key Value Pair. It must include “width” and “height” with positive integer value (in points, not pixels).

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: defaultTemporalSlotProfile
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Profile used in ad selection for temporal slots. Overrides playerProfile

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: defaultNonTemporalSlotProfile
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Profile used in ad selection for non temporal slots

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: -initWithServerURL:playerProfile:playerDimensions:
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Initialize the request configuration with server URL and player profile

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: -addValue:forKey:
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Add a key-value pair used in ad targeting. If called with same key multiple times, all the values will be added to the same key.

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: -addSlotConfiguration:
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Add a slot configuration. Please note, FWSlotConfiguration is an abstract class. Please use FWTemporalSlotConfiguration or FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration for constructing slot configuration accordingly.

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: -temporalSlotConfigurations
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Retrieve all temporal slot configurations added on the request configuration

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: -nonTemporalSlotConfigurations
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Retrieve all non-temporal slot configurations added on the request configuration

Classes/FWPlayerConfiguration.html#/c:ob.name: parseResponseOnBackgroundThread
Classes/FWPlayerConfiguration.html#/c:ob.abstract: Parse XML response on background thread instead of the main thread

Classes/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionConfig.name: view
Classes/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionConfig.abstract: The UIView associated with a friendly obstruction.

Classes/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionConfig.name: purpose
Classes/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionConfig.abstract: FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType used to describe the purpose of the friendly obstruction. Allowed values are FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionMediaControls, FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionCloseAd, FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionNotVisible, and FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionOther. See also: FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionType.

Classes/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionConfig.name: detailedReason
Classes/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionConfig.abstract: The detailed reason provided by the integrator for why the friendly obstruction was needed. The detailed reason can be nil. If not nil, it can be 50 characters or less and only contain characters A-z, 0-9, or spaces.

Classes/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionConfig.name: error
Classes/FWOMSDKFriendlyObstructionConfig.abstract: An error associated with a friendly obstruction.

Classes/FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration.h.name: initialAdOption
Classes/FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration.h.abstract: The configuration of the initial ad delivered into the slot (See FWSlotInitialAdOption)

Classes/FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration.h.name: compatibleDimensions
Classes/FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration.h.abstract: An array of compatible dimensions for the non-temporal slot. Each of the dimension must be a NSDictionary object with key “width” and “height”, the value of should be a positive integer. nil by default. Example:

Classes/FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration.h.name: acceptsCompanion
Classes/FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration.h.abstract: Whether companion ads are accepted by the slot

Classes/FWGDPRConsentConfiguration.html#.name: fwGDPR
Classes/FWGDPRConsentConfiguration.html#.abstract: FWConsentApplicable ENUM used to identify if GDPR consent applies to the user. Valid values are FWConsentIsApplicable or FWConsentNotApplicable.

Classes/FWGDPRConsentConfiguration.html#.name: fwGDPRConsent
Classes/FWGDPRConsentConfiguration.html#.abstract: String used to identify what information and which vendors were granted consent by the user.

Classes/FWGDPRConsentConfiguration.html#.name: -initWithConsentApplicable:GDPRConsentString:
Classes/FWGDPRConsentConfiguration.html#.abstract: A constructor used for manually instantiating GDPR consent information provided by the user.

Classes/FWConsentConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: gdprConsentConfiguration
Classes/FWConsentConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Used for holding GDPR consent configuration information.

Classes/FWConsentConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: ccpaConsentConfiguration
Classes/FWConsentConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Used for holding CCPA consent configuration information.

Classes/FWConsentConfiguration.html#/c:o.name: gppcmpapiConsentConfiguration
Classes/FWConsentConfiguration.html#/c:o.abstract: Used for holding GPP CMP API consent configuration information.

Classes/FWCCPAConsentConfiguration.html#.name: fwUSPrivacy
Classes/FWCCPAConsentConfiguration.html#.abstract: String used to identify the disclosures made and choices selected by a user regarding consumer data privacy in association with CCPA.

Classes/FWCCPAConsentConfiguration.html.name: FWCCPAConsentConfiguration
Classes/FWCCPAConsentConfiguration.html.abstract: A class used for configuring FWConsentConfiguration with user CCPA consent information.

Classes/FWConsentConfiguration.html.name: FWConsentConfiguration
Classes/FWConsentConfiguration.html.abstract: A class used for configuring the ad request with user consent information.

Classes/FWGDPRConsentConfiguration.html.name: FWGDPRConsentConfiguration
Classes/FWGDPRConsentConfiguration.html.abstract: A class used for configuring FWConsentConfiguration with user GDPR consent information.

Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)FWGPPCMPAPIConse.name: FWGPPCMPAPIConsentConfiguration
Classes.html#/c:objc(cs)FWGPPCMPAPIConse.abstract: A class used for configuring FWConsentConfiguration with user GPP CMP API consent information.

Classes/FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration.h.name: FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration
Classes/FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration.h.abstract: A class used for configuring the ad request with non-temporal slot information.

Classes/FWPlayerConfiguration.html.name: FWPlayerConfiguration
Classes/FWPlayerConfiguration.html.abstract: A class used for configuring the player settings

Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html.name: FWRequestConfiguration
Classes/FWRequestConfiguration.html.abstract: FWRequestConfiguration is a configuration object used in constructing ad request with convenience methods

Classes/FWSiteSectionConfiguration.html.name: FWSiteSectionConfiguration
Classes/FWSiteSectionConfiguration.html.abstract: A class used for configuring the ad request with site section information.

Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html.name: FWSlotConfiguration
Classes/FWSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: Abstract class for slot configuration. Please use FWTemporalSlotConfiguration or FWNonTemporalSlotConfiguration instead

Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.name: FWTemporalSlotConfiguration
Classes/FWTemporalSlotConfiguration.html.abstract: A class used for configuring the ad request with temporal slot information.

Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html.name: FWVideoAssetConfiguration
Classes/FWVideoAssetConfiguration.html.abstract: A class used for configuring the ad request with video asset information.

Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html.name: FWVisitorConfiguration
Classes/FWVisitorConfiguration.html.abstract: A class used for configuring the ad request with visitor information.
